name: To Health and Back
description:
Platform your way through the depths of hell so you can afford healthcare!

You've made a deal with the devil, now you just have to keep from losing all the money you're collecting!

Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 44 jam.

Ludum Dare Entry Page

Credits:
  • Breogan Hackett: Code, Game Design, Art Writing, Level Design
  • Fiachra Hackett: Music
Controls:
  • A/D or Left Analog Stick : Run
  • Space or A : Jump 
  • Shift or X : Sprint

Controller Recommended.
